expected_goal: Plan a 3-day Paris trip: get weather forecast, convert $500 USD to EUR, find tourist attractions, translate them to Italian, and save everything to paris_trip.txt.

atomic: Get the weather forecast for Paris for the next 3 days starting Monday.
Convert $500 USD to EUR using current exchange rates.
Search for popular tourist attractions in Paris.
Translate the attraction names to Italian.
Compile all information into a summary document.
macro: Get the weather forecast for Paris for the next 3 days starting Monday.
Convert $500 USD to EUR using current exchange rates.
Search for popular tourist attractions in Paris.
Translate the attraction names to Italian.
Compile all information into a summary document.
